00013 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_OPTIMIZERS_LBFGS_TEST_FUNCTIONS_HPP
00014 #define __MLPACK_CORE_OPTIMIZERS_LBFGS_TEST_FUNCTIONS_HPP
00015 
00016 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00017 
00018 // To fulfill the template policy class 'FunctionType', we must implement
00019 // the following:
00020 //
00021 //   FunctionType(); // constructor
00022 //   void Gradient(const arma::mat& coordinates, arma::mat& gradient);
00023 //   double Evaluate(const arma::mat& coordinates);
00024 //   const arma::mat& GetInitialPoint();
00025 //
00026 // Note that we are using an arma::mat instead of the more intuitive and
00027 // expected arma::vec.  This is because L-BFGS will also optimize matrices.
00028 // However, remember that an arma::vec is simply an (n x 1) arma::mat.  You can
00029 // use either internally but the L-BFGS method requires arma::mat& to be passed
00030 // (C++ does not allow implicit reference casting to subclasses).
00031 
00032 namespace mlpack {
00033 namespace optimization {
00034 namespace test {

00055 
00056   const arma::mat& GetInitialPoint() const;
00057

00059   arma::mat initialPoint;
00060 };
